resources.string: Increase Score By Shooting Alien Aircraft, Life Will Increase 1 When Score Reaches 10, 30, 60. And The Game Will End When Score Reaches 100 Or Life Is Out.
Are You Sure Want To Delete Your Account?
Password must be at least 6 characters

Failed To Sent Email Reset Password
By clicking the Green Button, you will receive an email from ikhwan_hanif to reset your password
Shoot The Alien not only entertains players with fast-paced action and stunning graphics, but also delivers an immersive story about courage, friendship, and the fight against evil across the galaxy.

As they enter the final battle near the center of the galaxy, the human pilots face the aliens, most powerful bosses. With their courage and resilience, they manage to defeat the boss and drive the alien fleet from the galaxy, saving the human colony and restoring peace in space.

During their journey across various planetary systems, the pilots encounter various challenges and obstacles. They must face surprise attacks, tame vicious alien craft, and discover weaknesses in the enemy fleet.

When an alien fleet suddenly appears from a wormhole in space, brave human pilots are immediately called into battle. Armed with the latest spaceships, our pilots launch into battle to protect human colonies from a mysterious alien threat.

The leaderboard will display the user\'s score from highest to lowest. To make the game more challenging. The score that will be displayed on the Leaderboard is the score with Medium or Hard difficulty and the score you just got, not HIGHSCORE.
Password reset can only be done if the email you registered previously is an active email. If the email you registered previously is not active, you can contact the developer for password reset.
